nodes.text: The father of the Nihil pirate Nan was a male individual. When his daughter was young, he and his entire family joined the pirate organization. A friend of the Zabrak commander Hague, Nan's father said that he was as good a strategist as he had ever known. Around 234 BBY, both of Nan's parents were killed in a raid, leaving her to become Hague's ward and student.
